name: SEO Automations
description: Optimize your website effortlessly with SEOOptimizeAPI - the powerful tool that provides valuable insights and automates repetitive tasks. With SEOOptimizeAPI, you can take the guesswork out of website optimization. The API utilizes advanced algorithms and technologies to provide in-depth insights into your website's performance and help you identify areas for improvement. And with its easy-to-use API endpoints, you can automate repetitive tasks and save time and effort.

api_methods.name: Extract top Keywords, Phrases by density + all headers
api_methods.description: Analyze any webpage's keyword density for SEO or research. Get the specified number of keywords or phrases you wish, sorted by density and occurrences in a JSON format. The algorithm has been optimized for pages with large amounts of text, as well as advanced cloud infrastracure ensuring accurate and speedy results for your SEO needs. This API uses Puppeteer to scrape even the most advanced SPA ( Single Page Applications ).

parameters.name: numPhrases
parameters.description:
Number of phrases to return ( results are sorted by density ). 
Between 1 and 100.
Default is 100.

parameters.name: phraseLength
parameters.description:
Number of words in each phrase to return ( results are sorted by density ). 
Between 1 and 10.
Default is 10.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description:
Number of Keywords to return ( results are sorted by density ). 
Between 1 and 100.
Default is 100.

utterances.utterance: Can you analyze the keyword density for the page at https://www.example.com?
I need the top 10 keywords from https://www.blogsite.com/article.
Get the top 5 phrases, each with 3 words, from https://www.news.com/latest.
What are the top 15 keywords by density on https://www.techsite.com?
Extract the top 8 phrases from https://www.travelblog.com/destinations.
Can you find the top 20 keywords and phrases from https://www.foodblog.com/recipes?
Analyze the page at https://www.educationportal.com for the top 7 phrases, each with 4 words.
Get the top 12 keywords from https://www.fashionmagazine.com/latest-trends.
I want the top 3 phrases, each with 2 words, from https://www.sportsnews.com.
Can you provide the top 25 keywords and 10 phrases from https://www.healthsite.com/articles?

api_methods.name: Extract Sitemap XML as JSON
api_methods.description: Are you looking for an API that can quickly and easily download and parse sitemap.xml files into JSON format? Look no further! Our API allows you to make a simple GET request, passing in the URL of a sitemap.xml file as a parameter. The API will handle the rest, downloading the file, parsing it into a JSON object, and returning the result in the response. And if you need a little extra information to help organize and navigate the URLs in the sitemap, we've got you covered there too. By adding a query parameter to the GET request, you can also include category and breadcrumb information for each URL in the parsed sitemap. Give it a try and see how much easier working with sitemaps can be!

utterances.utterance: Can you convert the sitemap from https://example.com/sitemap.xml into JSON format?
I need the sitemap from https://mywebsite.com/sitemap.xml in JSON, including category information.
Please parse the sitemap at https://shoponline.com/sitemap.xml to JSON and include breadcrumbs.
Get the sitemap from https://blogsite.com/sitemap.xml as JSON with meta details.
Can you fetch and convert the sitemap from https://newsportal.com/sitemap.xml to JSON with categories and breadcrumbs?
I want the sitemap from https://travelguide.com/sitemap.xml in JSON format, including meta and category data.
Extract the sitemap from https://foodblog.com/sitemap.xml as JSON with all additional information.
Can you provide the JSON version of the sitemap from https://techupdates.com/sitemap.xml?
Please convert the sitemap at https://fashionhub.com/sitemap.xml to JSON, including meta and breadcrumbs.
I need the sitemap from https://healthtips.com/sitemap.xml in JSON with categories.
